name: Seven Dungeons
description:
General Overview:

Play as the squishy character, Alpha as you run your way through the rooms trying to get to the seventh dungeon.  Each level you must attempt to reach the door without dying to dangerous dungeon obstacles!

System Requirements:
  • Screen aspect ratio of 16:9 required
  • Must be played in 'full screen'
Controls:
  • Arrow keys to move left, right and up
  • R key to start the game
Obstacles:
  • Green acid which makes you die
  • Dark green spikes which makes you die
  • Laser guns that make you die
  • Deep purple platforms and walls that are sticky
Current Time Record:
  • The current record is an insane 16 seconds! Good luck beating that!
